name: 84x246mm HE rocket
description: A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the recoilless rifle.  Designed to be highly effective against personnel.

name: 84x246mm HEDP rocket
description: A 84x246mm High Explosive Dual Purpose anti-materiel round for the recoilless rifle.  Designed to be highly effective against vehicles and structures.

name: 84x246mm smoke rocket
description: A 84x246mm smoke marker round for the recoilless rifle.  Commonly used for signaling, target designation, and for screening troop movements.

name: pistol ammo casing
description: An empty casing from a pistol round.

name: revolver ammo casing
description: An empty casing from a revolver round.

name: light rifle ammo casing
description: An empty casing from a light rifle round.

name: rifle casing
description: An empty casing from a rifle round.

name: rifle casing
description: An empty casing from a rifle round.

name: heavy rifle casing
description: An empty casing from a heavy rifle round.

name: belt ammo link
description: A small metal linkage from a disintegrating ammo belt.

name: pistol ammo
description: Ammunition for semiautomatic pistols, as well as submachineguns and the occasional robot.

name: pistol ammo+
description: High power ammunition for pistols, packed with extra powder.  It trades improved damage for increased recoil.

name: pistol ammo, AP
description: Armor piercing ammunition for pistols.  It trades improved penetration for slightly reduced damage.

name: revolver ammo
description: Powerful ammunition for large revolvers and magnum pistols.

name: light rifle ammo
description: Low recoil ammunition for rifles, designed for small game and humans.

name: light rifle ammo, incendiary
description: Military ammunition for rifles, designed to burn hotly upon impact, piercing armor and igniting flammable substances.

name: rifle ammo
description: Powerful and accurate ammunition for rifles, meant for taking down large game or humans.

name: rifle ammo, incendiary
description: Military ammo for rifles, designed to burn hotly upon impact, piercing armor and igniting flammable substances.

name: heavy rifle ammo
description: Serious ammunition for heavy machineguns and special military hardware, intended for destroying vehicles or very large creatures.

name: heavy rifle ammo, AP
description: Armor piercing ammunition for heavy machineguns and other military hardware.  It trades improved penetration for slightly reduced damage.

name: heavy rifle ammo, incendiary
description: Ammunition for heavy machine guns and other military hardware, designed to burn hotly upon impact, piercing armor and igniting flammable substances.
